contest-event.event-date:
June 5, 1926 D Spondon Band Contest
Spondon Band Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
spondon-band-contest
None
Melodious Gems
Spondon, Derbyshire Own choice march contest also held:- 1. Dove Holes Public Prize Band, 2. Long Eaton Silver Prize Band, 3. Pleasley Colliery Band. Prizes 1st £12 and cup, 2nd £6, 3rd £3. This was the fifth annual Spondon Band Contest for the Finney Challenge Cup, organised by the Spondon Grange Brass Band. "Admission to the Ground" was 1/- "including tax", and twopence for the programme and further twopence for a chair.
July 10, 2011, 6:23 p.m. Nov. 10, 2018, 11:47 a.m.
